summary: priscilla presley will serve as a witness at the first wedding to be held at an all - new chapel of love in las vegas . the 69 - year - old collaborated with nbc 's today show to launch a contest for one elvis - obsessed couple to win the ' ultimate wedding ' . the winning duo - announced next monday - will tie the knot at elvis presley 's graceland wedding chapel inside the westgate hotel on thursday , april 23 .

aspect: 1. Priscilla Presley will serve as a witness at the first wedding at an all-new chapel of love in Las Vegas.
2. The 69-year-old Priscilla Presley collaborated with NBC's Today show to launch a contest for an Elvis-obsessed couple to win the 'ultimate wedding'.
3. The winning couple will wed at Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel inside the Westgate Hotel on Thursday, April 23, with Priscilla Presley as a witness.
4. The wedding chapel is part of the first permanent Graceland exhibit of the singer's artifacts outside his iconic Memphis, Tennessee, home.
5. Couples can submit a video or photos along with an explanation detailing why they should be the first to wed at the Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel.
6. The winning couple will receive a free wedding reception, hotel suite, airfares, and concert tickets to the Elvis Experience theater show.
7. Priscilla Presley made clear that no impersonators will be allowed at the wedding.
8. The wedding chapel is a part of the first permanent Graceland exhibit of the singer's artifacts outside his iconic Memphis, Tennessee, home.
explain: Priscilla Presley, the former wife of Elvis Presley, will have a significant role in the first wedding that will take place at the newly-built Graceland Wedding Chapel within the Westgate Hotel in Las Vegas. She will be serving as a witness for the ceremony, further adding to the already high anticipation and excitement for the event.

The core idea of the given aspect is that Priscilla Presley, a 69-year-old celebrity, played a vital role in organizing a contest for an Elvis-obsessed couple to win a dream wedding. This collaboration was initiated with the NBC's Today show, which aimed to make the wedding ceremony a memorable event for the winning couple. The ultimate wedding prize was designed to create unforgettable memories for the winning couple, who will be the first to get married at the all-new Chapel of Love in Las Vegas. The ceremony is scheduled to take place at Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel, inside the Westgate Hotel, on Thursday, April 23.

The given aspect highlights that the winning couple from the "Ultimate Wedding" contest will tie the knot at Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel on April 23, and Priscilla Presley will serve as a witness for their wedding ceremony.

Graceland, the iconic Memphis, Tennessee home of Elvis Presley, is now permanently represented in Las Vegas by the new Chapel of Love at the Westgate Hotel. This represents the first time that Elvis's artifacts have been exhibited outside of his original home.

The aspect suggests that couples who are interested in getting married at the Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel can submit a video or photos, along with a detailed explanation, outlining their reasons for being selected as the first couple to wed at the newly renovated chapel in Las Vegas. This submission will be used to determine the winning couple, who will have the opportunity to wed on Thursday, April 23, 2023.

The winning couple in the NBC Today Show contest will receive a variety of prizes as part of the 'ultimate wedding' package.

Core idea of aspect: The 'ultimate wedding' contest winners, to be announced next Monday, will receive a range of gifts and benefits in addition to the actual wedding ceremony at Elvis Presley's Graceland Wedding Chapel. The prizes include a free wedding reception, hotel suite, airfares, and concert tickets to the Elvis Experience theater show.

Priscilla Presley has made it clear that Elvis Presley impersonators will not be allowed at the upcoming wedding at the all-new Chapel of Love in Las Vegas. This is because she wants the ceremony to have a personal touch and a true Elvis experience

The aspect is mentioning that the wedding chapel where the wining couple will hold their wedding is a part of the first permanent Graceland exhibit of Elvis Presley's artifacts. This information highlights the connection between the wedding place and the legendary singer. It emphasizes the significance of Elvis Presley's impact on popular culture and how his legacy continues to influence many aspects of our lives.
